items.name: Catfish
items.source: Found in Rivers andSecret Woods, 6am – midnight,SpringandFall. Only when raining.Can be found inSummerduring rain in theSecret WoodsandWitch's Swamp,Winterwith aRain Totem.

items.name: Shad
items.source: Found in Rivers, 9am – 2am,Spring,Summer, andFall. Only when raining.

items.name: Tiger Trout
items.source: Found in Rivers, 6am – 7pm,FallandWinter. Can be found in anyweather.

items.name: Carp
items.source: Found in the Mountain Lake, Anytime, duringSpring,Summer, orFall.Found inSecret WoodsorSewer, Anytime, All Seasons.

items.name: Bullhead
items.source: Found in the Mountain Lake, Anytime, All Seasons.

items.name: Red Snapper
items.source: Found in the Ocean, 6am – 7pm,SummerandFall. Only when raining.

items.name: Eel
items.source: Found in the Ocean, 4pm – 2am,SpringorFall. Only when raining.

items.name: Crab
items.source: Caught inCrab Pots(ocean), drops fromRock CrabsorLava CrabsinThe Mines

items.name: Ghostfish
items.source: Found in ponds inThe Minesfloors 20 and 60, Anytime, All Seasons. May also be dropped byGhosts.

items.name: Sandfish
items.source: Found in the pond inThe Desert, 6am – 8pm, All Seasons.

items.name: Woodskip
items.source: Found in theSecret Woodsand theForest Farm, Anytime, All Seasons.
